long_description: Designed with the whole family in mind, the Lakeshore Paddleboard Company Heavenly Stand Up Paddleboard is a stable, versatile recreational SUP for fun on flatwater. Vertically shaped front bow slices through the water, and front-displacement hull enhances performance on flatwater. Thick side rails increase stability, durability and buoyancy. 31 in. width offers stability that inspires confidence in beginning paddlers and offers pleasurable performance for any skill level. EPS, epoxy, bamboo and fiberglass construction reduces weight, increases durability and creates high responsiveness; bamboo layer reinforces board strength. Deck pad; tie-down points; carry handle; 11 in. single fin. Lakeshore Paddleboard Company Heavenly Stand Up Paddleboard weighs 31 lbs.
short_description: Designed with the whole family in mind, the Lakeshore Paddleboard Company Heavenly Stand Up Paddleboard is a stable, versatile recreational SUP for fun on flatwater.
